```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(plotly)
data("mtcars")
```

## Another Look at MTCARS Data
```{r mtcars}
f1 <- list(
  family = "sans serif",
  size = 14,
  color = "red")

# f2 <- list(
#   family = "Courier New",
#   size = 24,
#   color = "red")

x <- list(
  title = "Horse Power",
  titlefont = f1
)

y <- list(
  title = "Miles Per Gallon",
  titlefont = f1
  
)

plot_ly(data = mtcars, x = mtcars$hp, y = mtcars$mpg, size = mtcars$wt, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", symbol = mtcars$cyl, symbols = c(15,17,19), color = as.factor(mtcars$cyl), name = "Cylinder") %>% layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)
```
